modName: Dovahkiin - Wardrobe Room - a lot Mannequins
summary:
The mod adds a very large Wardrobe (storage for things) for all Player Houses (Whiterun, Markarth, Riften, Windhelm, Solitude). ~~~ 180+ mannequins, dragon priest mask, all relics, all doomstone, all crafting tools, all weapons, all armor Skyrim.
Last updated at 22 March 2012 - Version 2.50
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11444]Wardrobe Room[/url][/size][/b]

Sorry, I do not speak English, all this Google translator.
(Translated from Russian).
---------------------------------------------------------------

[size=4][color=#FFFF00]Description:[/color][/size]
[size=3][color=#00FF00]Version 2.36/2.50 -[/color][/size]
The mod adds a very large Wardrobe (storage for things) for all Player Houses (Whiterun, Markarth, Riften, Windhelm, Solitude).
[u]Includes:[/u]
- 8 rooms (holl, six rooms, secret room)
- [color=#FFA500]180 mannequins[/color] (60+6x20)
- 38 chest (14+6x4)
- 180 racks for weapons (0+6x6x5)
- 54 brackets for board (30+6x4)
- 6 showcases (0+6x1)
- dragon priest mask
- all relics
- all doomstone
- all crafting tools
- all weapons
- all armor.

[size=3][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3M82nEIWCcY&feature=youtu.be]Video - v.1.00[/url][/size]

[size=3][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8-EnkheR4WI]Video - v.2.20[/url][/size] - My Sexy Witches\' Sabbath=))

[color=#FF0000]Warning[/color] - plug-in does not add armor which is not in the game.
---------------------------------------------------------------

[u]Compatible with mods altering sex mannequins.[/u]

[size=4][color=#FFFF00]FAQ:[/color][/size]
Q: Why are all my wooden mannequins?
A: The mod does not alter the mannequins. We use the most standard to reduce the likelihood of errors.

Q: How to make a female (or male) mannequins?
A: Use this mod - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4164]Female (or male) mannequin[/url] (I recommend).

Q: How to change the race?
A: Use this mod - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4164]Female (or male) mannequin[/url]. The game will be given a choice of race for each mannequin separately.
---------------------------------------------------------------

[size=4][color=#FFFF00]History:[/color][/size]
version [color=#00FF00]1.00[/color] - Basic version: 1 holl, 100 mannequins, 4 chests.
version [color=#00FF00]1.02[/color] - Extended version: 2 holls, 100 mannequins, 4 chests, all armor, all crafting tools.

version [color=#00FF00]2.00[/color] - New basic version: Location altered radically different way - 8 halls, 108 [color=#FF1100]new[/color] mannequins, 10 [color=#FF1100]new[/color] chests, all crafting tools. Did optimization - 8 virtual rooms. New lighting. He began to furnish the interior.
version [color=#00FF00]2.01[/color] - Alternative version: Location altered radically different way - 8 halls, 100 [color=#00FF00]old[/color] mannequins, 4 [color=#00FF00]old[/color] chests, all crafting tools.
Did optimization - 8 virtual rooms. New lighting. He began to furnish the interior.
version [color=#00FF00]2.02[/color] - Alternative version: Left and right wing made in separate locations, separated by a loading screen. Central passage taken from v.2.00.

[u]Improved performance due to redistribution of armor around the rooms[/u]
version [color=#00FF00]2.10[/color] - Maximum version: Added 6-room locations. In each room there are 20 mannequins, 4 chest, 6 racks for weapons, 4 brackets for board, 1 showcase.
version [color=#00FF00]2.20[/color] - Working version: [color=#FF1100]Deleted[/color] 48 mannequins. In the main hall to be 60 mannequins, 30 brackets for board, 14 chests, all armor, all crafting tools.
+ 6-room locations. Added the Secrets Room.
version [color=#00FF00]2.21[/color] - Extended version: Added a [color=#FF1100]trap[/color]. Added beginning of Solitude, and Windhelm.

[u]Important update[/u]
version [color=#00FF00]2.36[/color] - Extended version: [color=#FF0000]Fix bug[/color] 720 hours (NoResetZone). Added the music. Added output of the other houses (Markarth, Riften). Added locks on all doors. Added all the shrines. Added all the doomstone. Added to the dragon priest mask. Part of the mesh is added.
version [color=#00FF00]2.42[/color] - Test version: Added four more rooms (260 mannequins). Companions can enter. Added mesh to the main hall.
version [color=#00FF00]2.50[/color] - Extended version (180 mannequins): Companions can enter. Added routes to companions. Added NPC-trader.
version [color=#00FF00]2.52[/color] - Maximum version (260 mannequins): Added routes to companions. Added NPC-trader.
...
---------------------------------------------------------------

[size=4][color=#FFFF00]Prospects for development:[/color][/size]
[color=#00FF00]Against this can be considered complete V-2.[/color]
The next update will be completely redesigned location.
Add NPC models and podium for demonstrations)
Enliven the interior - fireplace, a picture.
...
[color=#FFA500]Please report errors and shortcomings. You can also leave suggestions. I will try to take into account all in V-3.[/color]
author: Vasyner
